structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, secs. 286 and 287, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 9, effective July 1, 2008. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2010). This section, in the version effective until July 1, 2010, was amended by 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 286, but that version expired prior to the July 15, 2010, effective date of the legislation. The version of this section which was set to take effect July 1, 2010, was also amended during the 2010 Regular Session of the General Assembly by 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 287, and that version, as amended, is set forth above. (4/18/2008). This statute was created by 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 9, to be effective July 1, 2008, pursuant to sec. 12 of that Act. However, 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 127 (2008 HB 406, the State/Executive Branch Budget) provided in Part I, F.,16., (2) HVAC Permitting and Inspecting, that notwithstanding the delayed effective date provided in 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 12, the effective date of this statute shall be July 1, 2010.
